item.title: My first Blog
item.description:
Đây là blog đầu tiên của tôi. Cảm ơn Hugo và theme PaperMod.

OMG I don’t know why I couldn’t write my language - Vietnamese using Visual Studio Code. I will fix soon. Sorry if my English is not good but I do my best and ofcourse ChatGPT :)), thanks.

Why is Blog?

I created this blog and started writing because I want to share what I learn by myself and from my university, PTIT. My major is Software Engineering, but I have a passion for AI research, specifically in Computer Vision and image-based methods.
